attributes.action: Palestine to receive statehood backing from the UK without the condition of not pursuing Israel for war crimes
attributes.additional_details:
We, the people, believe that Israel has committed war crimes against the people of Palestine. For the British government to ask Mahmoud Abbas to not pursue Israel in return for their backing in the UN statehood vote is wrong and unjust.
We ask that the government provides Palestine with full backing in the vote without the aforementioned condition.
